{"id":1136974039,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 days, 23 hours","timestamp":1704396089,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1136974039/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Convert an Array Into a 2D Array With Conditions","memory":"30.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> findMatrix(vector<int>& nums) {\n        vector<vector<int>>res;\n        unordered_map<int,int>umap;\n        for(auto n:nums)\n            umap[n]++;\n        int cnt = INT_MIN;\n        for(auto x:umap)\n            cnt = max(x.second,cnt);\n        if(cnt==1)\n        {\n            res.push_back(nums);\n            return res;\n        }\n        while(cnt--)\n        {\n            vector<int>temp;\n            for(auto x:umap)\n            {\n                if(x.second >0)\n                {\n                    umap[x.first]--;\n                    temp.push_back(x.first);\n                }\n            }\n            res.push_back(temp);\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"convert-an-array-into-a-2d-array-with-conditions","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
